original_title: 愛欲温泉　美肌のぬめり
overview: Kiriko is a beautiful woman working in a quiet hot spring town. The owner of the inn, Goro, is attracted to her beauty and asks her out, but she refuses. Meanwhile, Imai, a detective staying at the inn, recognizes Kiriko's face and investigates her past on his own.
tagline: What is the secret of a beautiful woman who drifts into a hot spring town?
title: Lusty Hot Spring
